name: Axie Infinity
description: Axie Infinity is a virtual world filled with cute, formidable creatures known as Axies. Axies can be battled, bred, collected, and even used to earn resources & collectibles that can be traded on an open marketplace. Axie was designed to introduce the world to an exciting new technology called Blockchain, through a fun, smarter, nostalgic, & charming game.

websites.description: Discover the groundbreaking world of blockchain gaming with Axie Infinity.
App.Axie is a central hub for the Axie Infinity community, offering tools and features to enhance gameplay and user experience.

contracts.label: Axie Proxy
contracts.description: Proxy contract for the Axie NFTs

contracts.label: Marketplace Gateway V2
contracts.description: Proxy contract to settle marketplace purchases

contracts.label: Smooth Love Potion (SLP)
contracts.description: ERC20 token used for breeding Axies

contracts.label: Portal
contracts.description: Proxy contract to deposit and withdraw tokens to/from the game
